name: A Rose in the Twilight / ロゼと黄昏の古城
description: A girl awakens in a castle void of color and time, affixed with the Curse of Thorns upon her back. After meeting a sleeping giant, the two work together to escape. Help them unravel the mystery of the thorns and the history behind the somber castle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8.1/7 Processor: Core i3-2100 3.10 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphic 2000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8.1/7 Processor: Core i3-6100 3.70 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
